ack.p: We would like to thank the financial support provided by the FundoClima, linked to the Brazilian Ministry of Environment, to the René Rachou Institute for making its facilities available, and to the Post-Graduate Program in Public Health from René Rachou Institute. Many thanks to all those who participated in the vulnerability indicators main project, of which this research article is part of, and especially Chang Manyu and Maria Inês Nahas, for their help and support in the research project, and Giovanini Luigi, for providing the regionalized climate projections. We thank the Instituto Brasileiro de Geografia e Estatística of Manaus for its assistance in obtaining the riverine population data, the Companhia de Recursos Minerais for providing the population at risk data, Pedro and Ricardo from the Universidade Federal do Rio de Janeiro for the CDD modeling data, and Juliana Vasconcelos de Souza Barros for the demographic projections.
